author: Faith Karimi and Andy Rose, CNN
title: Walmart employees will be required to wear face coverings from next week - CNN
description: America's largest retailer will require all workers to wear face coverings starting Monday as the coronavirus pandemic ravages communities nationwide.

author: Jacqueline Howard, CNN
title: FDA approves new drug for patients with metastatic breast cancer - CNN
description: The US Food and Drug Administration has approved the use of the drug tucatinib, or Tukysa, in combination with chemotherapy, for the treatment of adults with advanced forms of HER2-positive breast cancer that either cannot be removed with surgery, or has spre…

author: Mallika Kallingal, CNN
title: Land O' Lakes replaces Native American woman logo, touts farmer-owned credentials instead - CNN
description: Land O' Lakes has removed the Native American woman kneeling against a background of green pine trees and a blue lake, leaving behind just the lake and trees with the words Land O' Lakes, 1921 in bold.

title: Here’s Why Bitcoin is Unlikely to Make Any Meaningful Near-Term Movements - newsBTC
description: Bitcoin may not be able to make any trend defining moves in the near-term, as an analyst is noting that the stock market's trend will be pivotal for BTC.
content:
After another day of sideways trading, Bitcoin has once again been unable to close its daily candle above $7,200, making the cryptocurrency prone to seeing further weakness in the weekend and week ahead.
